TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 在分析页的过程中计算表达式。

span.span: Evaluates expressions during page parsing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是表达式生成器（如类）的基类， 用于在页的分析过程中创建代码表达式。The class is the base class for expression builders, such as the class, that create code expressions during page parsing. 表达式生成器分析声明性表达式并创建代码以检索绑定到控件属性的值。Expression builders parse declarative expressions and create code to retrieve values bound to a control property. 在无编译情况下，支持无编译功能的表达式生成器将在运行时计算表达式。In no-compile scenarios, an expression builder that supports a no-compile feature evaluates the expression during run time. 当页分析器遇到用字符串分隔的表达式时 `<%$ %>` ，它将基于字符串中的前缀为该表达式创建一个表达式生成器。When the page parser encounters an expression that is delimited with the string `<%$ %>`, it creates an expression builder for the expression based on the prefix in the string. 前缀是位于冒号 (： ) 左侧的字符串部分。The prefix is the portion of the string that is to the left of the colon (:). 例如，当分析器遇到字符串时 `<%$ ConnectionStrings:MessageDB %>` ，它将创建一个 对象。For example, when the parser encounters the string `<%$ ConnectionStrings:MessageDB %>`, it creates a object. 前缀与节中 Web.config 文件中的表达式生成器关联 。Prefixes are associated with expression builders in the Web.config file in the section. 声明性表达式的右侧传递到表达式生成器进行计算。The right side of the declarative expression is passed to the expression builder for evaluation. 重写 方法以生成将与页一起编译的代码。Override the method to generate code that will be compiled with the page. 如果希望自定义表达式生成器在未编译的页上处于活动状态，则还必须重写 方法以返回表示该表达式结果的对象。If you want the custom expression builder to be active on pages that are not compiled, you must also override the method to return an object that represents the results of the expression. 还必须重写 属性，以指示自定义表达式生成器不支持编译页。You also must override the property to indicate that the custom expression builder does support no-compile pages. 通过实现表达式编辑器，您可以在设计时定义与控件属性关联的一组属性和方法。You can define a set of properties and methods for selecting and evaluating an expression that is associated with a control property at design time by implementing an expression editor. 编辑器通过类级元数据在表达式生成器上进行标记。The editor is marked on the expression builder through class-level metadata. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过实现抽象类来生成自定义表达式生成器 。The following code examples demonstrate how to build a custom expression builder by implementing the abstract class. 的此实现 返回传递给表达式的计算语句。This implementation of returns an evaluated statement that is passed to the expression. 若要运行此示例，必须先在 Web.config 文件中注册自定义表达式生成器。To run this example, you must first register the custom expression builder in the Web.config file. 第一个代码示例演示如何在 Web.config 文件中注册自定义表达式生成器。The first code example demonstrates how to register the custom expression builder in the Web.config file. ``` ``` 第二个代码示例演示如何引用 .aspx 文件中的表达式。The second code example demonstrates how to reference the expression in an .aspx file. ``` ``` 第三个代码示例演示如何通过从派生来开发自定义表达式生成器 。The third code example demonstrates how to develop a customized expression builder by deriving from . 若要运行此代码示例，必须将类放在 App_Code 文件夹中。To run this code example, you must place the class in the App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder/CS/MyExpressionBuilder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder/VB/MyExpressionBuilder.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能 使用构造函数直接创建的实例 。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of directly by using the constructor.

para.span: 从类派生时 ，重写 构造函数以实现表达式生成器实现的自定义初始化操作。

span.span: When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression builder implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望 对象在支持无编译功能的页面上处于活动状态，则可以重写 方法和 属性。If you want your object to be active on a page that supports the no-compile feature, you can override the method and the property. 方法应返回当前表达式的计算。The method should return the evaluation of the current expression. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用重写的 方法返回计算的表达式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the overridden method to return an evaluated expression. span.span: If you implement a custom expression builder, you must perform the proper type casting for the control property and return the cast operation in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写时，此方法会分析表达式，并将其返回为可用作 `parsedData` 或方法中的参数的对象 。When overridden in a derived class, this method parses the expression and returns it as an object that can be used as the `parsedData` parameter in a or method.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value indicating whether the current object supports no-compile pages.

value.span: 如果 支持表达式计算，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports expression evaluation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值 为 `false` 。The default value for the property is `false`. 若要支持无编译页，必须重写 方法和 属性。To support no-compile pages, you must override both the method and the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property.
